value:
Why did you call for me? Nobody
ever wants to see me.$k$pMaybe I'm dreaming...

You don't have to be nice to me.
I know how to take care of myself.
Nobody else will...

We can't change things. Can we?
I don't think so. Do you?

You want to hear me sing? That's...
But... There are much better singers
than me.

I can't trust anybody. Maybe in a
dream I could. That's the one place...
where nobody hurts me.

I was asked to come greet you by
$Nf.
Are you mean, or are you nice?

God may be capricious, but for
today...I'm happy.
I can feel the power inside me...
This...is what I expected.
Why are you being so nice to me?

I am Azura, princess of Nohr. I hope
you'll be nice to me. Please...

I felt trapped, trapped in a world
where I hated everything.$k$pI hated it so much that I wanted it to
just go away...all of it.$k$pBut there are a few people I can
trust...and so many voices calling
to me in my dreams.$k$pThere are people like you—you're
nice to me. You're very gentle, and
you even pat me on the head.$k$pMaybe...maybe I should spend a little
longer here.$k$pI don't know what's going to happen
next...$k$pBut if I'm with you, maybe things
will be OK. I feel like I can keep
going.
えい…
消えて
きゃあっ！
だめっ…
I can do it!
Leave me alone!
Be quiet!
Enough!
Don't want to die...
Um...
Please, stand tall.
You're a grown-up, aren't you?
Everybody's always picking on me... But you don't.
Patting me on the head does not make me happy. Don't treat me like a child!
I thought that things would never change… But you've shown me that they can.
I never had a home... Until I came here.
I'll stay here with you for a bit longer... If you want me to...
Well...
What's next?
Together.
